sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { Col, Container, Form, ListGroup, Row } from "reactstrap" import tourData from "../assets/data/tours" import avater from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg" import "../styles/tour-details.css" import calculateAvgRating from "../utils/avgRating" const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id===id) const {photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) const options= {day: "numeric", month:"long", year:"numeric"} return <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating=== 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating=== 0 ? 'Not Rated' : ({reviews?.length})} {address}
{city} ${price}/ per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/*=========tour reviews section start============ */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(review=>(
bishwagit

{new Date("07-09-2023").toLocaleDateString("en-US", options)}

5
)) }
{/*=========tour reviews section end============ */}
} export default TourDetails
